events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle, requesting to file a claim for damages sustained in the accident.
The claim was categorized under 'Auto Accident' based on keywords indicating a car collision and damages.
An experienced claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the investigation and guide the customer through the process.
The claim acknowledgment was sent to the customer confirming receipt and the start of the evaluation process.
Customer was asked to provide a police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and insurance policy details to proceed.
The customer submitted all requested documents including police report and photos, enabling further claim processing.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and contacted involved parties for further details.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident circumstances, liability established, and damage assessment finalized.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on the damage assessment and policy coverage limits.
Customer provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the prompt processing and clear communication.
The claim was officially approved by the underwriting team following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was transferred to the customer's bank account successfully.
The claim was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and customer satisfaction with the resolution.
All documents and files related to the auto accident claim were securely archived for future reference.
